results.title: Simvastatin attenuates spatial memory impairment via inhibiting microgliosis and apoptotic cell death against ethanol induced neurotoxicity in the developing rat hippocampus.
results.text_hl: In this study, we examined the protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Ethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000431 @@@ethanol@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxicity@@@ in the hippocampus of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ pups.

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers.
results.text_hl: @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ ameliorates @CHEMICAL_trimethyltin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C046488 @@@trimethyltin@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxicity@@@ and @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ through reversal of @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's@@@-associated markers.

results.title: Simvastatin markedly alters locomotor behavior parameters and induces mortality in planarians.
results.text_hl: Taken together, the results indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ promoted @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxic@@@ activity in planarians.

results.title: Simvastatin Prevents Neurodegeneration in the MPTP Mouse Model of Parkinson's Disease via Inhibition of A1 Reactive Astrocytes.
results.text_hl: Our findings reveal that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is neuroprotective via the prevention of conversion of astrocytes to an A1 @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxic@@@ phenotype.

results.title: Nose-to-brain co-delivery of repurposed simvastatin and BDNF synergistically attenuates LPS-induced neuroinflammation.
results.text_hl: Our findings indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@-@GENE_BDNF @GENE_627 @@@BDNF@@@-Ps could effectively inhibit microglial-mediated @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ as well as potentially resolve the @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxic@@@ microenvironment that is often associated with @DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@neuroinflammation@@@.

citations.NLM: Manickavasagam D, Lin L, Oyewumi MO. Nose-to-brain co-delivery of repurposed simvastatin and BDNF synergistically attenuates LPS-induced neuroinflammation. Nanomedicine. 2020 Jan;23():102107. PMID: 31655202

results.title: Increased cholesterol synthesis drives neurotoxicity in patient stem cell-derived model of multiple sclerosis.
results.text_hl: SASP from @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Chronic_Progressive @DISEASE_MESH:D020528 @@@PMS@@@ iNSC lines induced @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxicity@@@ in mature neurons, and treatment with the @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMGCR@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ altered the @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Chronic_Progressive @DISEASE_MESH:D020528 @@@PMS@@@ iNSC SASP, promoting cytoprotective qualities and reducing @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxicity@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates synaptic plasticity impairment in chronic mild stress-induced depressed mice by modulating hippocampal NMDA receptor.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ ameliorated the reduction of the magnitude of long-term potentiation (LTP) in Schaffer collateral-CA1, restored hippocampal dendritic spine density loss, improved the number of spine synapses, reversed the reduction in BrdU-positive cells in chronic mild stress (CMS)-induced @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depressed@@@ mice, and ameliorated @CHEMICAL_N_Methylaspartate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016202 @@@NMDA@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxicity@@@ in hippocampal neurons.
